episodes.overview: Detroit detectives investigate a double homicide; an elderly woman is murdered while taking groceries out of her car in Harris County, Texas.

episodes.name: Terribly Wrong; Settling the Score
episodes.overview: In Charlotte, when a store clerk and father of three young children is shot in a robbery by a masked man, lead Detective David Osorio and his team interview witnesses and find that no one knows the shooter. With little to go on, Osorio must find a way to identify his suspect before he can hope to track him down. And in Miami, lead Detective Kevin Ruggiero and his team head to Overtown to investigate the murder of a young father shot in the street. When Ruggiero learns that the victims friends are out to retaliate, he must race to find the shooter before theres another killing.

episodes.name: Final Call; Fatal Fury
episodes.overview: In Charlotte, rookie homicide Det. Brian Whitworth is assigned his first case when a woman is discovered on her bedroom floor, stabbed to death. Hampered by false leads and a lack of eyewitnesses, Whitworth must rely on the physical evidence to bring the killer to justice. Meanwhile, in Louisville, Det. Jon Lesher investigates the homicide of a 43-year-old father, gunned down in front of his house for telling a rowdy group of men next door to quiet down. The case comes to a standstill when an eyewitness steadfastly upholds the street's code of silence. Lesher must use his veteran-interview techniques to break the code and get the witness to talk.

episodes.name: Dying Declaration; One Last Score
episodes.overview: After a year with the gang unit, Detective Kevin Ruggiero returns to Miami Homicide, investigating a drive-by shooting that left two men dead. He has little to work with until he learns that one of the victims was a founder of a local gang. Then in Louisville, Detective Kristen Downs responds to the shooting of a 17-year-old boy. When she learns that his friends witnessed the shooting, she has to convince them to overcome their fear of retaliation in order to bring him justice

episodes.name: Street Law; Standing Up
episodes.overview: After a year with the gang unit, Detective Kevin Ruggiero returns to Miami Homicide, investigating a drive-by shooting that left two men dead. He has little to work with until he learns that one of the victims was a founder of a local gang. Then in Louisville, Detective Kristen Downs responds to the shooting of a 17-year-old boy. When she learns that his friends witnessed the shooting, she has to convince them to overcome their fear of retaliation in order to bring him justice

episodes.name: Brother's Blood; Trapped
episodes.overview: Two men are shot in a motel in Charlotte; and Miami detectives investigate an apparent suicide that they suspect is a murder.

episodes.name: Beatdown; Pistol Whipped
episodes.overview: In a bloody convenience store shooting, Birmingham Detective Chris Anderson needs an old surveillance system and cooperation from the victim's mother to help solve the case. When a Miami shooting follows a brutal public attack, Det. TC Cepero and his team try to piece together the turn of events to determine if the murder was justified.

episodes.name: Bad Company
episodes.overview: In Las Vegas, NV, Detective Jimmy Vaccaro and his team are called out at midnight to an empty desert highway, where a man's been shot dead in the middle of the road. From the victim's cellphone, they quickly get a lead: just minutes before he was killed, he received a call from a friend with whom he worked at a local strip club. But when they track down the co-worker and bring him to the station, the case takes an outrageous turn that exposes the ruthless underside of business in Vegas.

episodes.name: Night Out; One Gram
episodes.overview: A bystander is murdered with a brawl turns into a gunfight; a shooting victim's 911 calls may hold the answer to his killer's identity.

episodes.name: Fear Factor; Fall Guy
episodes.overview: In Birmingham, Detectives Eric Torrence and Henry Lucas investigate the murder of a 31-year-old male found dead in a field. But with a tight-lipped community where street law is paramount, finding someone to talk is the team's biggest challenge. As the clock winds down, will the community pull through and bring the killer to justice? Then, in Charlotte a man is chased down and killed in front of his nine-year-old son. Detective Blair Fitch is shocked to discover the killer was getting even with someone else. The case takes a surprising turn and leads detectives to New York where the suspect turns up in relation to another murder.

episodes.name: Mother and Child
episodes.overview: In Miami, ten days before Christmas, a young corrections officer is shot dead with her two-year-old son while sleeping in their bed. Det. Kevin Ruggiero and Sgt. Ervens Ford take the case personally--not only do they consider the victim 24-year-old Ciara Lee as "on our team", but the death of her baby boy hits them emotionally. In this intense manhunt the detectives uncover the intended target, the motive, and the suspected killers, making an arrest two days before Christmas. But a surprise twist at the end leaves them frustrated and determined.

episodes.name: Last Words; Nowhere to Hide
episodes.overview: In Birmingham, a 49-year-old man is beaten and shot in the middle of a housing complex in broad daylight. In a community where no one wants to be seen as "snitching," finding someone to come forward with information will be Detective Chris Anderson's biggest challenge. Then, in DeKalb County, lead detective Chris Franklin investigates the murder of an 18-year-old male, gunned down in an apartment complex. The case takes a turn when Franklin learns the killer's intended target was actually the victim's friend.

episodes.name: Love Her Madly; Off Track
episodes.overview: In Miami, the Homicide Unit responds to a scene to find the 911 caller covered in blood and a 35-year-old woman brutally stabbed. And in DeKalb County, Det. Joe Renaud and his team are working the shooting murder of a 22-year-old man.

episodes.name: Blood Alley; Bad Deal
episodes.overview: A man is found dead in an alley in a Birmingham suburb; A 24-year-old man is shot to death in his apartment in DeKalb County, Ga.

episodes.name: The Chase; One Shot
episodes.overview: A 69-year-old Navy veteran is murdered in Texas; and Birmingham detectives investigate a shooting death.

episodes.name: Caught in the Middle
episodes.overview: In Miami, two men are found beaten and shot behind an abandoned house. As Det. TC Cepero digs deeper into the case he unearths more than one reason the men could have been killed.

episodes.name: Pointless/Set Up
episodes.overview: In Birmingham, Detective Chris Anderson investigates the gruesome murder of a woman who is shot to death and then set on fire. Anderson hunts down his suspects, but it's the victim's family that reveals a final, disturbing twist in the case. In DeKalb County, Detective Joe Renaud is working the homicide of a father of four, gunned down outside an apartment complex on the east side of town. Without little to go on, Renaud and his team must put the pieces of this puzzle together to track down the killer.

episodes.name: Ultimate Price
episodes.overview: In Miami, a good Samaritan is shot dead while intervening in a robbery. Det. TC Cepero is forced to resort to a needle-in-a-haystack search for the getaway car, and for the homeless woman who may have seen the killer.

episodes.name: Hot Lot/Blind Faith
episodes.overview: In Birmingham, Lead Det. Henry Lucas and the Birmingham Homicide Team are trying to solve the mystery of how a young man ended up shot in the back in the middle of a scrap yard. With no witnesses, Lucas hopes the victim's friends can lead him to the killer. In DeKalb County, Lead Det. Lynn Shuler and the Major Felony Unit are called to a motel where a woman has been found dead.  The case takes a dark turn when the team learns that a man was in the room shortly before the woman died, but had since disappeared.

episodes.name: Missing
episodes.overview: In Harris County, Deputy Mario Quintanilla and his team are investigating the mysterious disappearance and possible murder of a 20-year-old single mother. After days of searching and only a bloody, abandoned car as evidence, Investigators needs to retrace her final steps to solve the mystery.

episodes.name: Deadly Encounter/Car Trouble
episodes.overview: A janitor is stabbed to death in Miami; a Birmingham pedestrian is killed after fixing a car for his friend.

episodes.name: Down in Overtown/Breaking Point
episodes.overview: In Miami, a young father is gunned down after a night of gambling. Detective Emiliano Tamayo has to figure out who would have killed him over twenty dollars. Then in Dallas, a child's birthday party turns deadly. The investigation becomes even more urgent when Detective Leo Gonzalez discovers the killer may be on the way to Mexico.

episodes.name: Tiny Dancers/Right Hand Man
episodes.overview: In DeKalb County, a keyboardist for a local church is gunned down in his home. Detective Lynn Shuler uncovers a web of lies that ultimately puts him on the path of the killers. Then, in Miami, rookie Detective Mario Gonzalez responds to a call about a man found shot dead in an abandoned car. Just as the case is about to run cold, a witness comes forward that shatters the case wide open.

episodes.name: Under One Roof/Off Target
episodes.overview: In Dallas, Detective Brian Tabor investigates the brutal stabbing of a man found in a vacant apartment. Now, detectives need a woman who may have lured him to his death, to come clean. Then in Birmingham, a wild gunfight leaves an innocent young man dead. Detective Jody Jacobs is on the hunt for two shooters and needs to determine who fired the first shot.

episodes.name: Bad Attitude/Collateral Damage
episodes.overview: Mike Smith and Walley Everett investigate the murder of a 23-year-old mother found burned in the backyard of an abandoned house.

episodes.name: Cold Light of Day
episodes.overview: An out-of-state truck driver is found dead in the cab of his rig; Texas investigators probe the murder of an exotic dancer.

episodes.name: Far From Home/Object of Desire
episodes.overview: An unarmed man is gunned down outside a bar; a woman is found bludgeoned to death in her apartment.

episodes.name: Unarmed/Bad Feeling
episodes.overview: Two friends are shot, then burned inside the trunk of a car

episodes.name: Brutal Business
episodes.overview: A woman is murdered in front of her daughter during a home invasion in Harris County, Texas; a Dallas teen runs into serious trouble while trying to sell a gun.

episodes.name: A Simple Plan/The Rip-Off
episodes.overview: An unarmed Miami man is shot in the back; three friends in Cleveland leave a party, but one of the group ends up dead.

episodes.name: Less Than Zero/Friends for Life
episodes.overview: An unarmed Miami man is shot in the back; three friends in Cleveland leave a party, but one of the group ends up dead.

episodes.name: House of Pain/Into the Night
episodes.overview: When a friendly house party turns into a double murder, the only female homicide detective in Cleveland has to piece together what went wrong. In Harris County, a hardworking father stops off for a drink after work and ends up the victim of a robbery gone bad.

episodes.name: Shattered
episodes.overview: In Dallas, a well loved man is discovered in his apartment on a bed of broken glass. With only fragments of clues the homicide team zeros in on a suspect, but nothing is what it seems.

episodes.name: Massacre in Little Haiti/Exposed
episodes.overview: A massacre outside a corner store leaves two dead and two clinging to life. With no witnesses, Miami detectives hope the surviving victims live to tell who pulled the trigger. In Cleveland, a man is found strangled in his apartment. Detectives go on the hunt for one of his friends and uncover a shocking motive.

episodes.name: Deadly Ride/Wrong Place, Wrong Time
episodes.overview: Detectives embark on a four-state manhunt to find the killer of a Cleveland driver; Miami police need citizens to loosen their lips and help them solve a murder.

episodes.name: Father and Son / Dangerous Attraction
episodes.overview: A Miami homicide team investigates the shooting death of a kindly father. Detectives investigate the murder of a Dallas man shot in his sleep, uncovering the shocking story of his girlfriend's dark past.

episodes.name: Murder in Pleasant Grove
episodes.overview: In Dallas, a dismembered body is found burned in an open field. With no leads on the victims identity, detectives turn to the public for help in solving this baffling case.

episodes.name: Innocent Bystander/Partners in Crime
episodes.overview: Surveillance video of a fatal stabbing at a Texas strip mall leaves a policeman with more questions than answers; a Dallas man is shot to death in his living room.

episodes.name: Blood Red/Deadly Moves
episodes.overview: Two Dallas men on their way to visit family are gunned down; a police detective searches for a burglar who strangled a Cleveland preacher.

episodes.name: Blood on the Streets
episodes.overview: Miami homicide detectives investigating a triple shooting on a crowded bus learn the violence was the result of an escalating street war.

episodes.name: School Girls/Out of the Shadows
episodes.overview: In Dallas, a fight among school girls turns into a deadly home invasion. Then, an attempted car jacking in Cleveland leaves an innocent man shot dead.

episodes.name: Fatal Call
episodes.overview: Dallas homicide detectives call upon the community for help when a man is shot to death in an apartment complex.

episodes.name: Killer Debt/House of Rage
episodes.overview: In Miami, a man is gunned down on a quiet city sidewalk. A mysterious car leads detectives on the trail of a suspect with a violent past. Then in Cleveland, a young mother of five is found shot in her apartment. With no witnesses, detectives turn to her outraged community for help.

episodes.name: Nightmare in Greedy Grove/Good Man Down
episodes.overview: A drive-by shooting in Dallas leads to the death of an innocent bystander; a young Cleveland father is killed as he attempts to break up a fight.

episodes.name: The House Next Door/The Showdown
episodes.overview: A Miami man is stabbed to death and dumped in an empty lot; a young father is the victim of a turf war.

episodes.name: Strapped/The Killer Next Door
episodes.overview: A teen is killed in Miami; two college students are robbed and shot while walking their dog in Cleveland.

episodes.name: Birthday Girl
episodes.overview: A 14-year-old Cleveland girl dies at her own birthday party when gunmen fire on a crowd; homicide detectives race to track down multiple shooters in the crime.

episodes.name: Deadly Obsession/The Killer You Know
episodes.overview: Police detectives conduct a three-state manhunt as they investigate the slaying of a young Dallas couple; a Cleveland man is found shot to death in his own backyard.

episodes.name: Hot Ride/Debt Collector
episodes.overview: A violent carjacking leads to the murder of a young father; a Miami musician is shot down in the street.

episodes.name: Desperate Moves
episodes.overview: Dallas detectives launch a manhunt for the person who gunned down an innocent man in his car.

episodes.name: Wild Ride
episodes.overview: Cleveland homicide detectives follow a bizarre trail of evidence in the case of a father of five who was stabbed over 50 times.

episodes.name: Easy Money/Ambushed
episodes.overview: In Dallas a young father is shot in the back, but no one wants to talk.

episodes.name: Uncommon Valor
episodes.overview: In Dallas, when a good Samaritan is gunned down trying to protect his friends, detectives must unravel a tangled web of bad tips and lies in their hunt for the killer.

episodes.name: Into the Graveyard
episodes.overview: In Miami, a family is shattered when two teenage brothers are gunned down in their own backyard. Two surviving friends point Detective TC Cepero and his team in the direction of two desperate and dangerous gunmen on the run. But Cepero will need the community's help to get the brazen killers off the street.

episodes.name: The Girl Who Knew Too Much/The Guardian
episodes.overview: In Dallas, an unidentified girl is found brutally shot in a field. Detectives Scott Sayers and Esteban Montenegro discover that she may have been killed for her silence. Then in Cleveland, a young father is shot in the head trying to break up a fight. Without any leads, Detectives Ignatius Sowa and Raymond Diaz must rely on an outraged community to help track down his killers.

episodes.name: The Cover Up/Bad Seed
episodes.overview: Police detectives search for an elusive killer who shot a man in a Cleveland courtyard; a 72-year-old grandmother is beaten to death in her Dallas home.

episodes.name: Best Laid Plans/Burned Alive
episodes.overview: In Cleveland, when a teenager is shot down in the street, detectives discover his best friends may have something to do with the murder. In Harris County, a young woman set on fire clings to life as deputies race to find who left her for dead.

episodes.name: New Year's Terror/Deadly Friends
episodes.overview: In Cleveland a man is gunned down defending his home on New Year's Eve. With no eyewitnesses, Det. Melvin Smith must rely on DNA evidence to track down the killers. And in Broward County, Florida, when an elderly man is found dead in his apartment, Det. John Curcio's hunt for the suspects leads to a surprising discovery.

episodes.name: Blood Feud
episodes.overview: A police detective hopes to locate the killers of two Miami men before the bloody turf war claims another victim.

episodes.name: Bad Reputation/Deadly Party
episodes.overview: A young mother of three is gunned down in front of her Cleveland home; a birthday party celebration in Florida turns deadly.

episodes.name: Update Special: Missing/Deadly Ride
episodes.overview: In Broward County, when a migrant worker is robbed and beaten to death, Dets. Valerian Perez and Kevin Forsberg must track down a vicious predator before he strikes again. Then, in Cleveland, a man is shot dead in broad daylight at a carwash, and Dets. Lem Griffin and Art Echols fear their case will go cold when none of the witnesses will talk.

episodes.name: When a Stranger Calls; Sweet 16
episodes.overview: The use of a stolen bank card leads Dallas detectives toward the killer of an elderly woman; a teenage honors student is found shot in her own backyard.

episodes.name: Deadly Morning
episodes.overview: A young mother is viscously murdered and dumped in an abandoned house. Detectives Nate Sowa and Ray Diaz make a surprising discovery about the killer.

episodes.name: Brother's Keeper; Fighting Words
episodes.overview: An innocent man is gunned down in a gang war. Detectives race to find his killers before any more blood is shed. In Dallas, a father is murdered close to home and detectives need his neighbors to give them a lead.

episodes.name: A Date With Death; Paid in Blood
episodes.overview: In Cleveland, for Detectives Kathleen Carlin and Tim Entenok, friends are the key to solving the murder of a father shot in the back. And in Dallas, can a surprising lead help Detective Brian Tabor catch up to the killer of an elderly man stabbed to death in his home?

episodes.name: Kiss of Death
episodes.overview: A man is shot to death in a nearby suburb, and police learn that his wife may hold the key to solving the crime.

episodes.name: Dead End Drive; The Fixer
episodes.overview: A group of carjacking killers terrorizes a Dallas neighborhood; tragedy results when an argument between friends gets out of control.

episodes.name: Bound and Burned
episodes.overview: A Dallas police detective must unravel a robbery plot when the body of an expectant father is found bound and burned in a creek bed.

episodes.name: Game Over; Long Walk Home
episodes.overview: New Orleans detectives have little to go on in the hunt for a killer; a young woman is gunned down in the street while walking home from work.

episodes.name: For a Quick Buck; Bloody Sunday
episodes.overview: Masked gunmen terrorize a Cleveland family and execute the young patriarch; Dallas detectives hunt for a killer who gunned down an innocent teen with an assault rifle.

episodes.name: Teardrops; Almost Home
episodes.overview: Dallas detectives hunt a car thief who fatally shot a man and stole his vehicle; detectives search for a witness for can identify the killer of a Cleveland man.

episodes.name: Jacked; Fallen Idol
episodes.overview: A young father is ambushed and killed at a Dallas gas station; detectives suspect an inside job in the case of a Miami rapper who was gunned down at his car wash.

episodes.name: Calling for a Killer; Boiling Point
episodes.overview: Detectives in Florida's Broward County investigate a fatal highway shooting; the execution of three friends outside a Dallas nightclub is caught on video.

episodes.name: Murder Rap
episodes.overview: Cleveland detectives uncover a shocking motive in the case of a bullied teen who was shot and killed outside a public library.

episodes.name: Heartless
episodes.overview: The brutal slayings of a mother and her two children send a New Orleans detective on the hunt for a suspect who may have been acquainted with the victims.

episodes.name: Run and Gun; Lonesome Highway
episodes.overview: A New Orleans police detective hunts for the killers of a recent high-school graduate; an unidentified woman is found shot and dumped on the side of a Dallas highway.

episodes.name: The Rookie; Cornered
episodes.overview: A police detective's first case as a lead involves hunting one of Ohio's most dangerous criminals; a New Orleans neighborhood remains silent following the daytime shooting of an innocent man.

episodes.name: The Graveyard Shift
episodes.overview: The murder of a Cleveland store clerk is caught on tape; police detectives learn that the suspects in the crime have a violent history.

episodes.name: Abandoned in the Bayou
episodes.overview: New Orleans police detectives piece together the last hours in the life of a mother of five, who was found bound and executed in an empty lot.

episodes.name: Killer Connection; Bloody Birthday
episodes.overview: Dallas detectives hope that video footage can identify the person who murdered a young father; a Cleveland mother of six is shot and killed on her birthday.

episodes.name: Murder Rap
episodes.overview: When a bullied teen is gunned down, Cleveland Detectives are shocked to discover the motive behind this senseless attack.

episodes.name: Jacked/Fallen Idol
episodes.overview: In Dallas, a young father is ambushed at a gas station. In Miami, a beloved local rapper is gunned down at his car wash.

episodes.name: Safe House
episodes.overview: Dallas homicide detectives discover nearly $1 million in the home of a man who was shot on his front porch; two violent suspects are tracked.

episodes.name: Deadly Secret/Behind Closed Doors
episodes.overview: In Dallas, when a young father is gunned down in front of his house, Detective Steve David discovers that the victim had a secret that may have led to his murder. Then, in Cleveland, a mother is found strangled and burned in her kitchen, but Detectives Nate Sowa and Ray Diaz have no witnesses and little evidence to track down her killer.

episodes.name: Cold Embrace
episodes.overview: In Cleveland, after a man is found dead in his car, the autopsy reveals he was strangled to death. Detectives Nate Sowa and Ray Diaz take the case and uncover a relationship that could lead them to their killer. But with Sowa's retirement right around the corner, can he solve the murder before the case goes cold?

episodes.name: Cold Betrayal
episodes.overview: In Cleveland, a man is gunned down at home in front of his family just a few days before Christmas. Detectives Tom Armelli and Bob Ford must delve into the dangerous business of drug dealing to hunt down the killers.

episodes.name: Graveyard Love
episodes.overview: In New Orleans, a man is ambushed in front of his grandmother's house. Detectives Jeffrey Vappie and Tim Bender suspect a woman close to the victimthe victim may have arranged the shooting, but they need hard evidence to prove it--and quickly, before it's too late.

episodes.name: After the First 48: Love Thy Neighbor
episodes.overview: An armed robbery escalates into capital murder and rocks a residential Houston neighborhood. One man is left for dead while his killers flee into the night. Four years later, will justice finally be served?

episodes.name: After the First 48: Easy Money
episodes.overview: A robbery at a Cleveland convenience store turns deadly when a store clerk is shot and killed. As police track down the men responsible, they discover more robberies and a second homicide that can be tied to the same suspects. But when the killers are brought into custody, the real drama begins, as they turn on each other--each bringing a very different story to the witness box.

episodes.name: Bad Medicine
episodes.overview: New Orleans Detective Ryan Vaught investigates a gruesome and horrific murder: a grandmother and her four-year-old grandson shot in her bedroom, leaving the grandmother dead and the four-year-old struggling to survive.

episodes.name: The Case That Haunts Me - A 10th Anniversary Special
episodes.overview: This special, two hour program features several well known First 48 detectives retelling the most haunting cases from their careers. Through interviews, dramatic recreations, and real case materials, these true crime stories from Memphis, Minneapolis, and Broward County will bring the viewer closer than ever to the personal and professional challenges faced by some of the most veteran First 48 investigators.

episodes.name: Senior Year
episodes.overview: Detectives Mike McCleery and Bob Bachelder investigate the murder of a promising high-school senior, shot to death the week before Christmas, and stuffed in the trunk of his car, 25 miles from home.

episodes.name: Shattered Glass
episodes.overview: In New Orleans, when a young mother is found beaten to death in her home, Detective Greg Johnson must fight to prove he has enough evidence against her killer, before he walks free.

episodes.name: Broad Daylight
episodes.overview: In New Orleans, a woman is executed in broad daylight, and Detective Chuck Ward discovers she may not be the killer's first victim. But can he find a witness willing to step up before more blood is shed?

episodes.name: Family Ties/A Good Neighbor
episodes.overview: In Dallas, when a husband is shot in his bed after an Easter party, Detective Michael Yeric suspects that the victim's wife may be hiding a dark secret. Then, in New Orleans, Detective Tanisha Sykes must solve the mystery of why a popular DJ is found bound and executed before his killer strikes again.

episodes.name: Murder in Treme
episodes.overview: In New Orleans, when a woman is slashed to death, the investigation into her murder leads Detectives Chuck Ward and Rob Barrere to a house of horrors, and they discover the killer may be someone they least expected.

episodes.name: Red Brick/Last Kiss
episodes.overview: After a number of women are murdered in East Cleveland, residents fear there may be a serial killer on the loose. When a grandmother is strangled and left to die on a vacant lot Detectives Bob Ford and Tom Armelli need to find out if her killing is related to the others. In Dallas, a young father is shot to death in his girlfriend's arms, in the back of his car. Detective Leo Gonzalez must find the killer before more bloodshed occurs.

episodes.name: After the First 48: Hot Ride
episodes.overview: A carjacking-turned-murder leaves a youth minister dead. Two men are caught and one suspect turns on the other. But, a last minute change of heart changes everything.

episodes.name: Dark Waters
episodes.overview: New Orleans Detective Ryan Vaught takes on his most challenging case yet when a young married couple goes missing and one of them is found floating in a river, drowned to death.

episodes.name: Dead Wrong
episodes.overview: In New Orleans, when a young father is abducted and shot in the street, detective Rayell Johnson hopes shocking surveillance footage can help him crack his first homicide case.

episodes.name: Ringside Seat
episodes.overview: Tulsa homicide delves into a dark world of drugs and prostitution to solve the murder of a man executed in his car in a motel parking lot.

episodes.name: Lying in Wait/With This Ring
episodes.overview: In Atlanta two men are ambushed at gunpoint and only one survives to tell the tale. A mother is found stabbed to death on the side of the road, but a wedding ring dropped at the scene could break the case.

episodes.name: The Passenger/Death Call
episodes.overview: hen a Tulsa man is gunned down at the wheel of his car detectives turn to a passenger who saw it all. A 20-year-old man in New Orleans is shot down minutes after his mother gets a warning about the murder.

episodes.name: Rocky Road/Something She Said
episodes.overview: In Atlanta, a man is shot to death over a gambling dispute at an illegal after hours club. Detective Kevin Otts battles against a wall of silence as he tries to track down the killer before he strikes again. And in Tulsa, two young lovers are murdered in cold blood. As he unravels the case, Detective Justin Ritter is shocked to learn why.

episodes.name: Fast Friends/The Thin Line
episodes.overview: In Cleveland, a young father is murdered in his car and detectives discover his friend may know who pulled the trigger. In Tulsa, the homicide team goes on the hunt for a shotgun wielding killer who tore a family apart.

episodes.name: After the First 48: Cold Justice
episodes.overview: In 1983, several young mothers are raped and murdered on the west side of Louisville Kentucky. A conviction on two of the murders leaves a third family with no justice. Until 31 years later, when the re-opened case and preserved DNA evidence lead police to a killer. But at trial, his attorneys question the investigation--and the memory of the victim's children--leading to an explosive confrontation.

episodes.name: Stray Shot
episodes.overview: When a stray shot leaves an innocent man dead in his home, Tulsa detectives discover a neighborhood under siege by young terrors. They race to track down the killers before more blood is shed.

episodes.name: After the First 48: Kiss of Death
episodes.overview: A man is brutally gunned down on a neighborhood street in Rochester, New York. Investigators believe his estranged wife, a prostitute, is lying to them about his murder. And when the case goes to trial, a conviction hinges on the testimony of two witnesses with shaky credibility.

episodes.name: Cranked
episodes.overview: When an innocent father is brutally stabbed, Tulsa Detective Justin Ritter delves into the dark and dangerous world of methamphetamine addiction in order to stop a killer on the edge.

episodes.name: After the First 48: Deadly Dance
episodes.overview: In Las Vegas, a professional dancer disappears without a trace. Her boyfriend, the last person to see her alive, provides no leads. Finally, after weeks of dead ends, a tip blows the case wide open. At trial, the prosecution has an eyewitness and plenty of evidence on their side. But when the defendant takes the stand, will his dramatic testimony win over the jury?

episodes.name: Neighborhood Watch/Eye in the Skye
episodes.overview: New Orleans homicide battles a wave of violence that has hit the Big Easy. Detective Travis Ward investigates the killing of a young man gunned down in a hail of bullets on the street. Six miles away, Detective Amy Robinson works the case of a man shot in cold blood behind a convenience store.

episodes.name: After the First 48: Date Night
episodes.overview: Just four days before Christmas 2013, a single mother of five is shot twice, dumped in a East Cleveland street, and ran over by the killer. As the investigation moves forward, the victim's husband goes from grieving spouse to main suspect. But at trial, his attorneys question the investigation--and say the state, which can't provide any witnesses to the crime, rushed to judgment. But what truly shocks the victims family is the deep, dark secrete about her husbands past.

episodes.name: Bad Love
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, a young woman is brutally gunned down in broad daylight. And Detective Justin Ritter suspects the witnesses know more than they are saying.

episodes.name: Soldier Down/Blood Vendetta
episodes.overview: In Atlanta, a young father is gunned down in cold blood at an abandoned car wash. As Detective Dwayne Sutton starts to track down the shooter, he learns the trail may lead to the Bloods gang. And when a Gulf War veteran is found shot to death in a park, Detective Michael Young has to delve deep into a dangerous underworld to find out why.

episodes.name: After the First 48: Murder Rap/New Year's Terror
episodes.overview: In Cleveland, Ohio, two murders rock the city. A young man leaves gang life behind to dedicate himself to ending the violence in his west side neighborhood. But soon after, he's shot dead. Once in custody, the killers shock police with their motive. And across town, two hours into the new year, a man is shot to death in a home invasion. The killers leave a blood trail but are nowhere to be found. Police and prosecutors search for justice and a family is left wondering if the killers will face justice.

episodes.name: After the First 48: Twice Told Tale
episodes.overview: It's a murder case that spans twelve years and centers on one 911 call. The victim says a name in the last moments of her life--will that be enough to convict her alleged killer.

episodes.name: Night Run
episodes.overview: When a young father is ambushed by a pack of brazen shooters, Atlanta Detective Summer Benton uncovers the shocking reason for his murder.

episodes.name: After the First 48: The Rookie
episodes.overview: In Cleveland, a beloved son and father is shot to death during a robbery. A single eyewitness comes forward to identify two suspects, both members of a notorious gang. Prosecutors assemble a case against the shooter they hope will send him away for good--but as trial approaches, the defendant's violent reputation has their witnesses terrified.

episodes.name: Closing Time/Family Matters
episodes.overview: In Atlanta, the brutal murder of a foreign exchange student is caught on video. In New Orleans, a shooting at a carwash becomes a family affair.

episodes.name: Last Run/Mean Mugging
episodes.overview: In New Orleans, a late night pizza delivery turns deadly. In Atlanta, a young man goes out to buy cigarettes and winds up murdered.

episodes.name: The House on Madrona Street
episodes.overview: In the season premiere, an Atlanta woman is strangled and the investigation unearths more potential crimes.

episodes.name: Blood on Bourbon
episodes.overview: Investigating a mass shooting in New Orleans.

episodes.name: Blood Lust
episodes.overview: A killer terrorizes Atlanta and investigators try to track him down.

episodes.name: Secrets and Lies
episodes.overview: When a young woman is executed on a street corner in Tulsa, investigator Nathan Schilling discovers her friends may be hiding information about the murder.

episodes.name: Murder on Maiden Lane
episodes.overview: In Atlanta, a young father is gunned down by a brutal robbing crew and Detective Tracy Lewis discovers on her first case that she may be chasing the wrong suspect.

episodes.name: Last Shift
episodes.overview: A violent attack in a Tulsa, Okla., barbershop leaves an employee dead and numerous people wounded; the hunt begins for a killer with an AK-47 assault rifle.

episodes.name: M.I.A.
episodes.overview: A welder has vanished under very suspicious circumstances and Tulsa homicide gets the case. Detective Matt Frazier and the rest of the team suspect foul play as they dive

episodes.name: Knock Knock
episodes.overview: Police must wade through a web of secrets and lies when a man is found dead in his Tulsa, Okla., hotel room.

episodes.name: The Third Man / Cash Money Murder
episodes.overview: When a popular New Orleans hip-hop promoter is gunned down next to his limousine, the search for the killer leads Detective Clinton Givens to more than he bargained for. In Tulsa, a friendly night of drinking at a senior center apartment complex leaves one man dead and another wounded. Detective Mark Kennedy must find a third man who was there to uncover what happened.

episodes.name: Moonie / Dark Impulse
episodes.overview: A New Orleans woman is found stabbed to death and stuffed in a trash bin the day before Thanksgiving; an Atlanta man's friend and girlfriend become suspects in the case of his fatal stabbing.

episodes.name: Bloody Valentine / Storm Warning
episodes.overview: A young father is killed while visiting his son in Tulsa and a home invasion kills one teenager and leaves two more wounded in Atlanta.

episodes.name: The First 48 Presents: Killer Verdict
episodes.overview: In every murder trial, the prosecution and the defense present two radically different stories of what happened. We get to sit in the jury box and decide which story to believe and reach our own verdict. In this episode, a shooting on a Florida beach leaves a beautiful young woman dead and her husband wounded with four gunshots. In a twist, the authorities arrest the most unlikely suspect--the surviving husband.

episodes.name: In a Lonely Place
episodes.overview: A young New Orleans mother is found shot and burned in the trunk of her car following a night out on the town.

episodes.name: Broken Home
episodes.overview: The case of a young New Orleans mother who was ambushed at home and fatally shot hinges on the eyewitness account of a 4-year-old girl.

episodes.name: The Fighter / Final Ride
episodes.overview: A New Orleans father and his friends are ambushed while sitting in a parked car; a feud between households in an Atlanta apartment complex leads to the killing of a promising boxer.

episodes.name: The Ties That Bind
episodes.overview: An Atlanta man is gunned down in his home by an AK-47; the victim's wife holds a dark secret that could tear the family apart.

episodes.name: Old Wounds
episodes.overview: The target of a drive-by shooting in Tulsa, Okla., walks away from the attack, while his girlfriend is not so fortunate; police uncover a long-simmering feud as they hunt for the killer.

episodes.name: Bloodline
episodes.overview: A Tulsa, Okla., detective hunts a family of elusive criminals after a former Marine is fatally shot while trying to recover his stolen bicycle.

episodes.name: Dark Corners / Gundown
episodes.overview: In New Orleans, a transgender female is shot four times - the victim of an apparent robbery. In Atlanta, two men draw guns in an underground mall, but only one survives.

episodes.name: Down on Bourbon / Deadly Trap
episodes.overview: A double killing on New Orleans' Bourbon Street leaves the city on edge; Tulsa, Oklahoma, detectives believe that a shooting victim may have been lured into a trap.

episodes.name: House of Cards
episodes.overview: A Tulsa, Okla., detective pieces together fragmented accounts from five potential witnesses as he investigates a crime involving a lethal combination of guns and meth.

episodes.name: Mother of Two
episodes.overview: When a young mother is found naked and strangled in her car, Tulsa Detective John Brown uncovers a dark obsession that may have turned deadly.

episodes.name: Snapshot
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, a young mother of four is found shot on the side of the road. Detectives' only clue is a photograph she took just moments before her murder.

episodes.name: 1000 Cuts / Draw
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, an innocent mother is viciously murdered with a butcher knife. While in Atlanta, a beloved patriarch is gunned down when a game of dominoes turns deadly.

episodes.name: Sudden Death / Devil at the Door
episodes.overview: In New Orleans, a man is executed in broad daylight, and Detective Ryan Vaught must battle fear and distrust on the street to identify the killer. And in Minneapolis, when a teenager is murdered at home, Sargent Christopher Gaiters' best hope for finding the killer is the victim's father, who witnessed the shooting.

episodes.name: The Invitation
episodes.overview: When a young man is shot to death at a motel party, Tulsa Detective Justin Ritter discovers a photo posted on Facebook may have triggered a dangerous chain of events.

episodes.name: Bad Tempered / The Bully
episodes.overview: In Atlanta, a caretaker is gunned down over a grudge. And in Tulsa, a young man loses his life when a bully goes too far.

episodes.name: Room for the Night / Down and Out
episodes.overview: Detective Rob Barrere investigates when three men meet in a motel room in New Orleans east, and one of them ends up dead; while in Tulsa, Detective Ronnie Leatherman catches the case of a man stabbed 21 times when a night of drinking ignites a murderous rage.

episodes.name: Chopper
episodes.overview: When an Atlanta father of two is gunned down with an AK-47, rookie detective Scott Berhalter must sift through lies and alibis to get his killers off the street.

episodes.name: Deadly Premonition
episodes.overview: After a young woman has a deadly premonition, the New Orleans homicide team discovers her killer may have killed before.

episodes.name: Taken for a Ride
episodes.overview: In Atlanta, a brash murder in front of an elementary school turns up a familiar name.

episodes.name: Killer Contact
episodes.overview: When a young man is found shot dead in his van, Tulsa Homicide retraces his final hours and gets caught up in a web of lies.

episodes.name: Mr. New Orleans / No Shelter
episodes.overview: New Orleans Homicide works the stabbing death of an infamous local criminal. In Minneapolis, a squabble amongst friends leaves a woman brutally murdered in a bus station.

episodes.name: Bad Romance / Out of Control
episodes.overview: In Minneapolis, when a young Somali girl is executed in bed, Sergeants Charlie Adams and Chris Thomsen uncover a secret relationship that may have turned deadly. In Tulsa, a beloved son is shot dead when a house party spins out of control, and Detective Ronnie Leatherman hits roadblocks in his search for a desperate and dangerous killer.

episodes.name: Murder on the Bluff
episodes.overview: When a turf war leaves an elderly woman dead, Atlanta Homicide turns up the heat to prevent more bloodshed.

episodes.name: A Fighting Chance
episodes.overview: When an argument at a local bar ends with a young social activist shot sixteen times, Tulsa Detective Ronnie Leatherman searches for answers in a divided community.

episodes.name: Deadly Favor / Just Kids
episodes.overview: Detective Rayell Johnson investigates the shooting death of an elderly New Orleans man found dead outside his home. A man and a woman are caught on camera committing a murder.

episodes.name: Deadly Lies / Stay Down
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, when a man is shot and run over by a car, Detective John Brown must cut through conflicting stories to separate friend from foe. In Atlanta, when one man is killed and another clings to life after a gunman opens fire outside of a nightclub, surveillance video will be key to Detective Summer Bentons investigation.

episodes.name: The Other Wife
episodes.overview: When a father is gunned down protecting his wife in Kansas City, detectives hope his ex-wife knows who wanted him dead.

episodes.name: Love Hate / A Soldier's Life
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, a young woman goes on the run when her boyfriend is murdered. In Atlanta, an army veteran is gunned down after helping a homeless man.

episodes.name: A Man's Game
episodes.overview: In Atlanta, when a young man is shot and left to die in the bushes, a mysterious white Town Car will be the key to Detective Calvin Thomass investigation.

episodes.name: Fatal Mistake
episodes.overview: A night out leaves an innocent man dead. When solid leads hit dead ends, detectives discover a motive they never expected.

episodes.name: Bullets Have No Names
episodes.overview: A retired pre-school teacher is killed and detectives rely on a witness to crack the case.

episodes.name: Fatal Showdown / Deadly Text
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, a man is gunned down in broad daylight, but the truth may be more than it appears. Meanwhile in New Orleans, a man is shot eight times in his own home when a text message falls into the hands of a killer.

episodes.name: Deadly Rap
episodes.overview: Detectives uncover a vengeful motive while investigating a shootout in an Atlanta rap studio that left two men dead.

episodes.name: Officer Down
episodes.overview: When one of their own is executed in cold blood, detectives discover he may not be the killers first victim. Can New Orleans homicide stop a suspect who targets the law before more blood is shed?

episodes.name: Dangerous Business
episodes.overview: When a suburban teenager is found dead in a robbery gone bad, Minneapolis Detective Emily Dunphy must find out which of the victims friends may have double-crossed him.

episodes.name: Deadly Dispute / Heart to Heart
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, a running street battle leaves a young father dead. And in Atlanta, a man defending his mothers honor gets shot in the back.

episodes.name: In the Line of Fire / Over the Edge
episodes.overview: When a New Orleans teenager is gunned down walking from the store, Detective Wayne DeLarge must determine if the killer is friend or foe. In Kansas City, a local businessman is executed and Detective Jason Sutton looks to his employees for a motive.

episodes.name: House of Horrors / Final Sacrifice
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, a vicious hammer attack leaves two young men clinging to life. Detectives race to catch the suspect before he strikes again. In Atlanta, detectives discover a selfless act performed by their victim led to his murder.

episodes.name: A Murder in Mobile
episodes.overview: When a homeless man is gunned down on the sidewalk, Mobile detectives discover a petty motive.

episodes.name: Honor Code
episodes.overview: In Atlanta, a decorated veteran and grandfather is ambushed when he checks on a rental property.

episodes.name: Runner Runner
episodes.overview: In Mobile, when a quick money scam ends in a double murder, a rookie homicide detective takes it personally.

episodes.name: Monster
episodes.overview: A Tulsa, Okla., police detective tracks a sadistic killer who murdered the brother of a man who stole his truck.

episodes.name: Dangerous Company
episodes.overview: A missing father turns up dead when his plans to evict a tenant ignites a murderous rage.

episodes.name: Endless Love & Out of Time
episodes.overview: A woman is beaten and stabbed to death in her home in an act of vengeance; a Kansas City man is unable to get out of a dangerous business.

episodes.name: Trap House
episodes.overview: When a man is murdered just before Christmas, his family helps Tulsa, Okla., detectives search for his killers.

episodes.name: Devil in Me & Trail of Blood
episodes.overview: A Tulsa, Okla., man is shot and killed when a stranger sees an opportunity too good to pass up; in Atlanta, an escalating argument ends with one man dead and the other in danger.

episodes.name: Cruel Summer
episodes.overview: Gunmen open fire on a porch, shooting four children and three adults; a police detective turns to the New Orleans community for help in solving the case.

episodes.name: Rearview Killer & Point Blank
episodes.overview: A parking lot drug deal turns into a shootout that claims the lives of two Atlanta men; an execution outside a Tulsa, Okla., motel escalates into a double murder when the killer spots a witness to the crime.

episodes.name: Score to Settle & In Her Arms
episodes.overview: A father is killed when a man opens fire in a crowded convenience store in Atlanta; a Tulsa, Okla., groom-to-be is gunned down before he can turn his life around.

episodes.name: The Girl Next Door
episodes.overview: In Atlanta, when a young man is shot from 235 feet away, Detective Darrin Smith discovers an escalating feud that threatens to tear apart a neighborhood.

episodes.name: Fallen Hero / The Last Deal
episodes.overview: When a 90-year-old war hero is shot in the back, detectives discover his former neighbor may hold the key to what went down; a young man's future is cut short when a plan to make a quick buck goes horribly wrong.

episodes.name: Inside the Tape Special #4
episodes.overview: A late-night shooting in North Minneapolis leaves one man dead and another alive to help detectives identify the killer. In Tulsa, a late night party turns into a blood bath, but a Facebook video may help Detective John Brown dispute a suspects claims that he wasnt there. In Tulsa again, Detectives must decide if a duo responsible for an all night car-jacking spree ended in the gruesome murder of a single father. In Tulsa, an innocent victim is caught in the cross fire as a surge of gang violence rips through the city.

episodes.name: Inside the Tape Special #5
episodes.overview: In New Orleans, when a man is robbed and shot multiple times on his payday, Detective Rob Barrere has a hunch this isnt just a random robbery gone wrong. In New Orleans, when an eyewitness points out a potential suspect at the crime scene, Detective Nick Williams must determine if they have the right guy. When a man is found shot dead in his car, St. Louis detectives hope a local prostitute can point them in the direction of the shooter. In KCK, a feud between neighbors gets out of control and leaves a father of 5 shot in the head on his doorstep.

episodes.name: Inside the Tape Special #6
episodes.overview: In Minneapolis, surveillance cameras at a convenience store capture more than just a shooting. When a dead body is found days after the murder, Minneapolis Homicide must scramble to catch up to the killer. Minneapolis detectives need the help of the Somali community to help solve the murder of one of their own. The life of a 19-year old woman hangs in the balance after walking in on an intruder in her home.

episodes.name: Inside the Tape Special #7
episodes.overview: In New Orleans, when a star witness identifies her boyfriends killers, detectives suspect it may be too good to be true. After two young men are killed, Detective Nick Williams tries to get their friend to change his ways before he becomes another victim. A teenager tells Tulsa homicide that his friend accidentally shot himself, but the evidence points in another direction. In Mobile, when a homeless man is brutally murdered, detectives conclude that its not just a random act of violence but something much more personal.

episodes.name: Stolen Innocence
episodes.overview: When a young mother and her friend are murdered in front of her children, Tulsa detectives hope a suspicious vehicle will lead them to the killer.

episodes.name: Deadly Secrets & True Lies
episodes.overview: Detectives investigate the double murder of two family men in Minneapolis, urging a witness to come clean; in Tulsa, Okla., a young woman is found dead in a dumpster after she discovers the fate of her fianc.

episodes.name: Bad Lick & Red Dawn
episodes.overview: After a generous Atlanta man is murdered, Detective Egbert suspects he may have been a victim of his own kindness; in Tulsa, Okla., a man is shot while driving down the street; Sgt. Walker questions youths who tried to break into the victim's house.

episodes.name: Last Hope & Truth and Consequences
episodes.overview: In Atlanta, a teenager's life is cut short over a neighborhood beef; in Tulsa, Okla., a young woman goes missing, and her family fears she was murdered.

episodes.name: Standing Ground
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, a high-school football player is gunned down when his friends make a dangerous decision. Detectives must separate witnesses from suspects to find out who fired the fatal bullet.

episodes.name: End of the Road
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, Okla., an unsolved case comes to life when new evidence sheds light on a dead man's friend.

episodes.name: Lost Boys

episodes.overview: A Tulsa, Okla., man is murdered in front of his fiance when death comes knocking at their door; a beloved man is gunned down while protecting his friends from a shooter's rage.

episodes.name: Buried Secrets

episodes.name: The Visitor
episodes.overview: In Atlanta, after his mother reports him missing, a man is found dead, naked and shot twice in his bedroom.

episodes.name: Rise Up / Somebody's Friend
episodes.overview: In Atlanta, a woman is found dead in a garbage can, and a young man is ambushed by neighborhood bullies.

episodes.name: Family First
episodes.overview: When a young man goes missing in Tulsa, Okla., detectives must crack a family's code of silence in order to find him.

episodes.name: After Hours / The Cutting Edge
episodes.overview: In Atlanta, a stranger guns down a new father in a parking lot; in Georgia's Gwinnett County, a man is stabbed more than 20 times when someone he trusts turns against him.

episodes.name: The Fallen Angel

But the viciousness of her mysterious death evokes the sympathy of the entire Homicide Unit who pitch in to identify her and recreate her last hours on earth from tiny clues. The case captures the hearts of the public and, with tips flooding in, the detectives work round the clock to try to find her killer/killers.

episodes.name: Young Guns
episodes.overview: When an innocent bystander protecting a young woman is gunned down, detectives scramble to learn who fired the fatal shots before anyone else gets hurt.

episodes.name: Inside the Tape Special #10

In St. Louis, a woman is murdered in broad daylight and the main suspect is found nude walking down the street. When surveillance footage shows a man carrying a box moments before he is shot, Detective Tracy Casey must determine if the box's contents holds the key to determining motive. In Tulsa, Detectives must decide if a duo responsible for an all night car-jacking spree ended in the gruesome murder of a single father.

episodes.name: Inside The Tape Special #11
episodes.overview: When a homeless man is found dead and an accidental death seems most likely, Detective Ryan Vaught must convince the squad its cold blooded murder. In New Orleans, when a new father is brutally gunned down, Detective Drew Deacons only lead is pinned on something the killer left behind. Detectives investigate on the highway when a driver is hit by AK-47 gunfire from another vehicle. After two young men are killed, Detective Nick Williams tries to get their friend to change his ways before he becomes another victim.

episodes.name: Inside the Tape Special #12
episodes.overview: In New Orleans, when an eyewitness points out a potential suspect at the crime scene, Detective Nick Williams must determine if they have the right guy. New Orleans detectives prepare to face an armed gunman suspected to be hiding in his apartment after killing two men on his doorstep. When a man is randomly shot in front of his sisters house, a disturbed neighbor may be the most likely suspect. In Mobile, when a bleeding young father is found by his friends, detectives are surprised to discover who pulled the trigger.

episodes.name: Final Word

episodes.name: Cut Short

episodes.name: Killer Rage / A Killer at the Door

episodes.name: Meet Up for Murder

episodes.name: No Way Home

episodes.name: Think Twice

episodes.name: Inside The Tape Special #13
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, Detectives must decide if a duo responsible for an all night car-jacking spree ended in the gruesome murder of a single father. In New Orleans, when a new father is brutally gunned down, Detective Drew Deacons only lead is pinned on something the killer left behind. In Mobile, when a bleeding young father is found by his friends, detectives are surprised to discover who pulled the trigger. Then, when a home invasion leaves a father-to-be shot dead, Detective Dianna Baumanns only hope for answers is a suspect fighting for his own life.

In New Orleans, when a man is robbed and shot multiple times on his payday, Detective Rob Barrere has a hunch this isnt just a random robbery gone wrong. When surveillance footage shows a man carrying a box moments before he is shot, Detective Tracy Casey must determine if the boxs contents holds the key to determining motive. A late-night shooting in North Minneapolis leaves one man dead and another alive to help detectives identify the killer.

episodes.name: Death at the Door

episodes.overview: In Tulsa, a late-night meeting spins out of control, leaving a young father dead, his friend critically injured, and their SUV crashed through a child's bedroom.

episodes.name: Hunted on the Highway
episodes.overview: In Mobile, two men are killed after their car is sprayed with bullets on the highway, Ieading detectives across the country in search of answers.

episodes.name: Bad Business
episodes.overview: When a young father from Atlanta is shot dead on a Mobile street, detectives discover that his talent for computers may have gotten him in over his head.

episodes.name: Below the Surface
episodes.overview: After a 69-year-old woman is found dead in her bathtub, a suspect leads Tulsa detectives on a high-speed chase that ends tragically.

episodes.name: Death by Username
episodes.overview: Mobile homicide follows a trail of social media messages to track down the killers of a 17-year-old.

episodes.name: Inside The Tape Special #15
episodes.overview: When a home invasion leaves a father-to-be shot dead, Detective Dianna Baumann's only hope for answers is a suspect fighting for his own life. In Atlanta, two brothers are found shot dead in their home leaving Detective Scott DeMeester with little to go on, when his only potential suspect suddenly wants to talk. When a man is shot dead inside a boarding home, Atlanta detectives try to drum up a lead from a roommate involved with the suspect. The life of a 19-year-old woman hangs in the balance after walking in on an intruder in her home. When Tulsa detectives find the suspect, they realize it's not the first time they've stood face-to-face.

episodes.name: Inside The Tape Special #16
episodes.overview: A surveillance camera on a Minneapolis bus captures a shooting outside a church. The footage leaves detectives wondering if the shooter acted in self-defense. Surveillance cameras at a Minneapolis convenience store capture more than just the shooting. Footage suggests vital DNA may have been left in the store by the shooter himself. Then, surveillance footage in Atlanta shows a man carrying a box moments before he is shot, Detective Tracy Casey must determine if the box's contents holds the key to determining motive. Additional Minneapolis surveillance cameras capture the shooting of a young man in the Cedar-Riverside neighborhood. But detectives need the help of the Somali community to identify the shooters in the video.
